item.title: On-Ramping with Dee: Episode #24
item.dc:creator: Corey Petty
item.description: Guests: Jessica Cantrall On this On-Ramping, Dee talks with Jessica to answer some of the questions about crypto that have been ailing her. What is a stablecoin? Why are people using stablecoins? What is a Dex? Etcetera… Enjoy!

item.title: On-Ramping with Dee: Episode #23
item.dc:creator: Corey Petty
item.description: Guests: Rebecca Butler It has been a while since The Bitcoin Podcast Network had a showing of On-Ramping with Dee. Rebecca has held a small amount of bitcoin for a few years and is now to the point where she would love to absolve some of her questions and concerns regarding bitcoin’s value propositions. She […]

item.title: On-Ramping with Dee: Episode #22
item.dc:creator: Corey Petty
item.description: Guests: Tony Swish TONY SWISH! The man that on-ramped me to Ethereum two years back has come back from a much needed break from Crypto. He discusses his withdrawal from the industry and what he likes and dislikes about its current state. He was a marketer in this space before being a marketer in this […]

item.title: On-Ramping with Dee: Episode #21
item.dc:creator: Corey Petty
item.description: Guests: Karima @BitcoinBae on twitter, or AKA Karima Williams, Founder of DC Crypto Club. A passionate Community Organizer that has found a need in the DC area to, well, organize the community. With a background in working with political campaigns to organize social media communities, she applies her experience part-time in the crypto world to get […]

item.title: On-Ramping with Dee: Episode #20
item.dc:creator: Corey Petty
item.description: Guests: Andre In this episode of On-Ramping with Dee, he speaks with Andre Milteer, Marcello’s Dad. This was less of an on-ramping and more of a discussion about what a bitcoin infused future could look like. Andre has yet to take the investment dive into cyrptocurrency, but, he is almost there. It’s a nice and […]

item.title: On-Ramping with Dee: Episode #19
item.dc:creator: Corey Petty
item.description: Guests: MaryKathryn MaryKathryn is an attorney doing regulatory and transactional work in the healthcare space. She is working in Chicago.

item.title: On-Ramping with Dee: Episode #18
item.dc:creator: Corey Petty
item.description: ﻿ Guests: Paul Spadone Paul Spadone is an Engineering Manager based in Houston, Texas. He also a a close friend of Dee’s. They went through the suck in ROTC together. Link to Intro/Outro tune: https://open.spotify.com/track/63VBNsTfld7uPXRkxCxXTh

item.title: On-Ramping with Dee: Episode #17
item.dc:creator: Corey Petty
item.description: Guests: Kenn Bosak Our very own Kenn Bosak was hacked…so I asked him to stop by and help us learn some lessons together. When you are in crypto, digital security should always be on the forefront of your mind. With this episode we aim to reestablish that fact.

item.title: On-Ramping with Dee: Episode #16
item.dc:creator: Corey Petty
item.description: Guests: Wayne Meet Wayne. He is a long time listener of the network and active member of the Slack. He signed up to come on OWRD and clicked the “Just want to hangout with Dee” option in my scheduler. We had a good time, talked about good things. He expressed his affinity for Bitcoin and […]

item.title: On-Ramping with Dee: Episode #15
item.dc:creator: Corey Petty
item.description: Guests: Mike A fan of the show that joined the Slack, joined the conversation, and then listened to old episodes of ORWD (On-Ramping with Dee) to discover how a little bit more about he basics of bitcoin. He wanted to come onto ORWD to ask a few more questions and represent the beginner in the […]
